summary.zh-CN: 新增筛选与多选导出功能，优化悬浮标签体验，并解决了多个重要问题，提升插件稳定性和国际化支持！
summary.en: Added filtering and multi-select export features, optimized floating tag experience, and resolved several important issues to improve plugin stability and internationalization support!

description.zh-CN: 现在可以按平台、时间范围筛选对话；并且按需多选对话导出
description.en: Now you can filter conversations by platform and time range; and multi-select conversations for export as needed

description.zh-CN: 当拖拽悬浮标签接近屏幕边缘时，会显示视觉引导提示，松手后标签会贴边半隐藏
description.en: When dragging the floating tag near screen edges, visual guidance prompts appear, and the tag will semi-hide at the edge after release

description.zh-CN: 解决图标在国际网络环境较差时无法显示的问题，提升插件稳定性
description.en: Fixed icon display issues in poor international network environments, improving plugin stability

description.zh-CN: 扩展导出文件的字符支持，新增日文平假名、片假名、韩文字符支持，修复日文用户导出 zip 文件时的文件名乱码问题
description.en: Extended character support for exported files, added support for Japanese Hiragana, Katakana, and Korean characters, fixed filename encoding issues when Japanese users export zip files

description.zh-CN: 避免手动保存模式下，刷新页面会触发自动保存
description.en: Prevent automatic saving from being triggered when refreshing the page in manual save mode

summary.zh-CN: 优化了记录管理体验，现在可以直接在列表中修改标题，同时增强了数据持久化能力，让你的聊天记录更安全！
summary.en: Optimized record management experience. You can now edit titles directly in the list, and enhanced data persistence to keep your chat records safer!

description.zh-CN: 现在可以在记录列表上直接修改标题了
description.en: You can now edit titles directly in the record list

description.zh-CN: 优化了记录卡片和详情页的交互
description.en: Optimized interactions for record cards and detail pages

description.zh-CN: 数据持久化增强: 防止数据被浏览器自动清理
description.en: Enhanced data persistence: prevents data from being automatically cleared by the browser

summary.zh-CN: 感谢用户 @James 的建议，你要的合并导出聊天记录为单一文件的功能来了，方便大家与 AI 平台对话交互 🥰
summary.en: Thanks to user @James' suggestion, the feature to merge and export chat records into a single file is here, making it convenient for everyone to interact with AI platforms 🥰

description.zh-CN: 新增「合并为一个文档」导出的功能，方便与 AI 平台对话
description.en: Added 'merge into one document' export feature for convenient AI platform conversations

summary.zh-CN: 文案优化和 Gemini 平台功能增强，再也不怕多用户状态下，Gemini 的对话记录无法保存了！感谢用户 @William、LUCIFER 的反馈 🙌
summary.en: Copy optimization and Gemini platform enhancements. No more worries about Gemini conversation records not being saved in multi-user scenarios! Thanks to users @William and LUCIFER for their feedback 🙌

description.zh-CN: 修正悬浮标签「自动记忆中」文案为「自动记忆」，防止误解
description.en: Fixed floating label text from 'Auto Memorizing' to 'Auto Memory' to prevent misunderstanding

description.zh-CN: 新增对 `/*/*/app/*` 和 `/*/*/gem/*/*` URL 格式的支持
description.en: Added support for `/*/*/app/*` and `/*/*/gem/*/*` URL formats

summary.zh-CN: 增加首次安装引导功能，方便你们快速上手～
summary.en: Added first-time installation guide feature to help you get started quickly~

description.zh-CN: 增加了首次下载安装时，弹出引导网页的功能
description.en: Added feature to show guide webpage when first downloading and installing

summary.zh-CN: Chat Memo 的第一个对外公开版本，祝大家使用愉快！
summary.en: Chat Memo's first public release version, hope everyone enjoys using it!

description.zh-CN: 新增了强大的关键词搜索功能，可以快速在所有对话记录中查找内容
description.en: Added powerful keyword search functionality to quickly find content across all conversation records

description.zh-CN: 修复了 Gemini 平台的问题，确保刷新页面后不会丢失消息记录
description.en: Fixed Gemini platform issues, ensuring message records won't be lost after page refresh

description.zh-CN: 产品名称正式更新为 "Chat Memo"，以更好地反映其核心价值
description.en: Product name officially updated to "Chat Memo" to better reflect its core value

description.zh-CN: 优化了界面 UI 细节
